trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows button control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en Windows-knappekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A Button can be clicked by using the mouse, ENTER key, or SPACEBAR if the button has focus.
trans-unit.target: En knapp kan aktiveres ved hjelp av musen, angi nøkkel eller mellomrom hvis du er i fokus.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> to allow users to click a button by pressing the ENTER or ESC keys even if the button does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>slik at brukere kan knappen ved å trykke ENTER eller ESC nøklene selv om du ikke har fokus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: This gives the form the behavior of a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Dette gir skjemaet virkemåten for en dialogboks.

trans-unit.source: When you display a form using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A> property of a button to specify the return value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Når du viser et skjema ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>metoden, kan du bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A>egenskapen for et for å angi verdien som returneres av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the button's appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre utseendet for knappen.

trans-unit.source: For example, to make it appear flat for a Web look, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Angi for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> slik at det vises flate for Web se

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property can also be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, which appears flat until the mouse pointer passes over the button; then the button takes on the standard Windows button appearance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>egenskapen kan også settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, som vises flate til musepekeren sender over knappen; deretter knappen tar på standard Windows-knappen utseendet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the control that has focus accepts and processes the ENTER key press, the Button does not process it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis kontrollen som er i fokus godtar og behandler nøkkelen trykk deretter angi knappen ikke behandle den.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> or another button has focus, that control processes the ENTER key press instead of the accept button.
trans-unit.target: Hvis flere linjer for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>eller en annen knapp har fokus, kontroll behandler angi key trykk i stedet for å godta.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: By default the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> displays no caption.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>viser ingen tekst.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: To specify the caption text, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi tittelteksten, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode by which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref> automatically resizes itself.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir modus som i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref> skaleres automatisk seg selv.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> on the base class when creating a window.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> på basisklassen når du oppretter et vindu.

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this property to add extra functionality, but must first call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> constructor on the base class to verify that the control continues to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Arving klasser kan overstyre denne egenskapen for å legge til ekstra funksjonalitet, men må først kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>konstruktør for basisklassen å bekrefte at kontrollen fortsetter å fungere på riktig måte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> object on the base class when creating a window.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> objekt på basisklassen når du oppretter et vindu.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that is returned to the parent form when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som er returnert til det overordnede skjemaet når den ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult> for this property is set to anything other than `None`, and if the parent form was displayed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method, clicking the button closes the parent form without your having to hook up any events.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>for denne egenskapen er satt til noe annet enn `None`, og hvis det overordnede skjemaet ble vist via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>metoden, klikker du knappen lukker skjemaet overordnede uten å måtte koble hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>

trans-unit.source: The form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property is then set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult> of the button when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Skjemaet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>deretter settes til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>når knappen klikkes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to create a "Yes/No/Cancel" dialog box, simply add three buttons and set their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult> properties to `Yes`, `No`, and `Cancel`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å opprette en "Ja/Nei/Avbryt" for å legge til tre knapper og angi deres <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>egenskapene som skal `Yes`, `No`, og `Cancel`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren dobbeltklikker du <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> style bits are set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control, and the DoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>stil biter er satt til `false` for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>kontroll og DoubleClick denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren dobbeltklikker du <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref> kontroll med musen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> style bits are set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control, and the MouseDoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>stil biter er satt til `false` for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>kontroll og MouseDoubleClick denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref> whether it is the default button so that it can adjust its appearance accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Varsler den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref> om det er standardknappen slik at den kan justere utseendet tilsvarende.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the parent form to notify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> that it should be set as the default button and to allow it to adjust its appearance accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av det overordnede skjemaet til å varsle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>at det må angis som standardknappen og at det som justere utseendet tilsvarende.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a button that is the default button for a form has a thicker border than other buttons on the form.
trans-unit.target: En knapp som standardknappen i et skjema har vanligvis en tykkere kantlinje enn andre knapper i skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: Calling the NotifyDefault method only draws the button as a default button; it does not change its behavior.
trans-unit.target: Kaller metoden NotifyDefault bare tegner knappen som standardknappen; virkemåten endres ikke.

trans-unit.source: To make the button behave like a default button, it must be assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: For å gjøre fungere som en standardknapp, må den være tilordnet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the button is to have the appearance of the default button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du skal ha utseendet til standardknappen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnFontChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnFontChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseEnter*> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseEnter*>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseEnter*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave*> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave*>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseUp*> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseUp*>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseUp*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseUp method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnMouseUp kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnTextChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnTextChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event for a button.
trans-unit.target: Genererer en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> hendelsen for knapper.

trans-unit.source: This method can be called to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan kalles for å øke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Behandler etikettens tegn.

trans-unit.source: When overriding ProcessMnemonic in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's ProcessMnemonic to ensure that basic functionality remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrer ProcessMnemonic i en avledet klasse, Husk å kalle den basisklassen ProcessMnemonic for å sikre at basisfunksjonalitet forblir uendret.

trans-unit.source: The mnemonic character entered.
trans-unit.target: Etikettens tegnet som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the mnemonic was processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis mnemoniske ble behandlet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.String>som inneholder navnet på den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, eventuell.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan ikke overstyres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder navnet på den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, hvis aktuelt, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> er uten navn.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Behandler Windows meldinger.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> prosessen.
